document_data.name: Nalvor
document_data.mainbody: '''Nalvor''' was an inhabitant of [[Scornubel]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, Nalvor at [[the Stormy Tankard]] sought the services of a certain [[Fraea]], and a woman quoted a price of four [[gold piece]]s to him. He began to quibble, and was warned the price would rise to five.
